name: Notes on Machine Learning
tagline: machine learning, deep learning, neural networks
body:
### Notes on Machine Learning
This is a website that I will use throughout 2016 Summer while I do my internship and learn about Machine Learning, with focus on Deep Learning. The information that I find interesting will be shared here so that I will have a history and notes of subjects that I fiddled with.

e.g. this is the paper that revolutionized deep learning by breaking 5 separate records for several datasets:
http://arxiv.org/pdf/1207.0580.pdf
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
